service.name: workflowmanager
service.summary: Service managing Workflow and WorkflowRun states.

publishes.name: WorkflowRunStateChange
publishes.summary: Event represents a change in the state of a workflow execution.

subscribes.name: WorkflowRunStateChange
subscribes.summary: Event represents a change in the state of a workflow execution.

markdown.content:
The workflow manager is our own internal pipeline service that listens to events from workflow execution services and handles them within our own domain. 

<NodeGraph />
